entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
